titles: His Maiesties declaration to all his loving subiects in the county of Cornwall, &c.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
publisher: by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the Vniversity,
notes: An expression of gratitude for their loyalty and patience.
Dated at end: Given at Our campe at Sudeley Castle the tenth of September. 1643.
Includes: The agreement of the Maior, aldermen, and inhabitants of the towne of Tenby.
With engraving of royal seal at head of document.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
